programme.title: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: No Rastro da Morte, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Cowan procura pelo seu amigo de infância Catlow, mas revela-se que Cowan é um oficial de polícia e a relação entre ambos não será nada fácil. Catlow é um ladrão, que junto com seus homens, reuniu gado sem marcar e planeja vendê-lo em Abilene.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: O Dólar Furado, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Estados Unidos, segunda metade do século 19. Gary O'Hara é um ex-capitão do Exército dos Estados Confederados.

programme.title: O Passado Não Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: Quando Explode a Vingança, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Juan Miranda é um camponês rude com coração de Robin Hood. Sean Mallory é um revolucionário irlandês que é especialista em dinamite e vive agora no México.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, é escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem é perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, começa uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Por amor ou por dinheiro, (2019, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Um romance de conto de fadas toma um rumo inesperado quando Mark descobre que sua bela noiva, Connie, está planejando roubá-lo. Para não ser tolo, Mark embarca em uma missão para ver até onde Connie irá roubar seu dinheiro.

programme.title: Uma Última Vez, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan Derringer é um dentista solitário na Flórida. Quando confrontado por uma figura do passado trazendo notícias, ele precisa embarcar em uma jornada de descobertas fantásticas e também desesperadoras, que vai mudar sua vida para sempre.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Crime)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: A Última Viagem, (2019, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Uma confusão fatídica em um voo de Nova York para a Irlanda tem consequências complicadas para Daniel Murphy.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: O Assassino do Central Park, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Seis melhores amigos do ensino médio se reúnem para uma noite de diversão no Central Park. O que eles ainda não sabem é que um assassino mascarado está à solta no local, apenas esperando para colocar o seu plano de vingança em prática.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Apartamento 3D - O mal mora ao lado, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tudo parece perfeito para Erin e Ben depois que eles se mudam para um novo apartamento em Nova York, até que um estranho fica obcecado por eles.

programme.title: A Múmia Ressurge, (2021, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes de arqueologia desperta uma múmia antiga. Depois de ficarem presos em um loop temporal, a única maneira de escaparem é derrotar a múmia.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: O Monstro dentro de você, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Depois de uma noite de festa Lou se levanta com sintomas desagradáveis que indicam que algo está errado. Seu corpo muda pouco a pouco de uma maneira estranha, há manchas em sua pele e ele tem visões que a impedem de distinguir a realidade da ficção.

programme.title: O Dia Da Múmia, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack Wells explora a tumba do rei Neferu na esperança de recuperar um diamante lendário quando a múmia do rei retornar dos mortos em busca de vítimas humanas.

programme.title: O feitiço da Casa Whaley, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caça aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi decidem encontrar o arco e flecha e destruí-lo para impedir que haja mais vítimas. Eles o encontram no sótão, mas escutam um som estranho.

programme.title: A caminho da escola de bicicleta, Koichi atropela um gato dentro de um saco. Um homem vê o acidente e chantageia Koichi, exigindo que ele pague pelo enterro do animal.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Pepper, que matou Keicho e roubou o arco e flecha, aparece diante de Josuke. Jotaro conta a Josuke e aos outros dois sobre um cara.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Seguindo as ordens de Jotaro, Josuke e Koichi ficam no porto e procuram Chili Pepper. O usuário do Stand aparece e acredita que pode vencê-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke reluta, mas tenta convencer o pai a voltar para casa. Joseph causa todo tipo de problema e diz que um usuário de Stand está por perto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraíso, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Forçado fazer uma jornada perigosa, um nobre guerreiro se depara com inúmeras dificuldades, lugares misteriosos, magia e aventura para chegar ao que seria o paraíso distante.

programme.title: Meu Amigo Ninja, (2018, Children)
programme.desc: Em uma fábrica ilegal de bonecas na Tailândia, um empresário malvado explora crianças trabalhadoras. Após um infeliz acidente, uma boneca ganha vida e viaja para a Dinamarca, onde faz amizade com um garoto, pedindo ajuda para se vingar.

programme.title: Os Dragões De Camelot, (2013, Adventure)
programme.desc: Uma feiticeira cruel assume Camelot e usa três dragões mortais para caçar os restantes Cavaleiros da Távola Redonda.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: Os Piratas da Rua de Baixo, (2020, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando uma família de piratas se muda para a chata Sandsborough, os vizinhos não ficam muito felizes. Michiel e seu novo amigo pirata Billy tentam fazer com que a família se misture, mas seu arquiinimigo chega à cidade e planeja roubar um tesouro.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Karatê Girl, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Uma estudante do ensino médio no Japão que é uma estudante de karatê arrogante, mas magistral, torna-se feroz quando se junta a uma equipe disfarçada de lutadores.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que está tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do país está em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches, (1959, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Massive bloodsucking monsters are at large in this Drive-in schlock classic from producers Roger and Gene Corman. Basically, its a bunch of actors in plastic costumes, but director Bernard Kowalski made the most of his small budget.

programme.title: Creature From The Haunted Sea, (1961, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A crook decides to bump off members of his inept crew and blame their deaths on a legendary sea creature. What he doesn't know is that the creature is real.

programme.title: The Undead, (1957, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A beautiful woman is sent back in time via hypnosis to the Middle Ages where she finds she is suspected of being a witch, and subject to being executed.

programme.title: The Brain Eaters, (1958, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a small Illinois town begin disappearing after a strange cone is found sticking out of the ground nearby.

programme.title: Little Shop Of Horrors, (1960, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: A Bucket of Blood, (1959, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: A frustrated and talentless artist finds acclaim for a plaster covered dead cat that is mistaken as a skillful statuette. Soon the desire for more praise leads to an increasingly deadly series of works.

programme.title: Tower of London, (1962, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Vincent Price shines as Richard of Gloucester, the ambitious brother to a dying king. When he is overlooked to take the throne, he goes on a murderous rampage...only for the ghosts of those he has slain to return from the grave and haunt him!

programme.title: The Fall Of The House Of Usher, (1960, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: When a beautiful young woman's suitor arrives to ask her hand in marriage, the doors of the mysterious house of Usher fling open...and terror begins.

programme.title: The Raven, (1963, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: The sorcerer Craven learns from fellow magician Dr. Bedlo that his supposedly dead wife is alive and living at the castle of master sorcerer Dr. Scarabus.

programme.title: House On Haunted Hill, (1959, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

programme.title: The Masque of the Red Death, (1964, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: When the sadistic prince (Vincent Price) finds that the Red Death has arrived in the village he rules, he forsakes his people and hides in his castle with his fellow aristocrats…until a mysterious stranger turns his haven into a danse macabre!

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Double Impact, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune.

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 1, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Bride wakes up after a long coma. The baby that she carried before entering the coma is gone. The only thing on her mind is to have revenge on the assassination team that betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino completes the quest for revenge in KILL BILL; VOL. 1; as The Bride (Uma Thurman) crosses the final names off her death list.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When four teenagers all meet with mysterious deaths exactly one week after watching a videotape, investigative reporter Rachel Keller tracks down the video... and watches it.

programme.title: The Ring Two, (2005, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When evidence at a local crime scene reveals a mysterious unmarked videotape, Rachel realizes that Samara is back and more determined than ever to continue her relentless cycle of terror.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2, (2010, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: As a couple welcome a newborn baby into their home, a demonic presence begins terrorizing them, tearing apart their perfect world and turning it into an inescapable nightmare.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3, (2011, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Paranormal Activity 3 takes you back to where it all began, and the activity is more intense than ever. The cameras are on and recording the chilling moments when evil begins to terrorize young sisters Katie and Kristi for the first time.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2, (2010, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: As a couple welcome a newborn baby into their home, a demonic presence begins terrorizing them, tearing apart their perfect world and turning it into an inescapable nightmare.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3, (2011, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Paranormal Activity 3 takes you back to where it all began, and the activity is more intense than ever. The cameras are on and recording the chilling moments when evil begins to terrorize young sisters Katie and Kristi for the first time.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 4, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Katie disappeared with her nephew Hunter with no survivors. Five years later she's returned with a mysterious boy, ready to target new victims with her demonic rage in a quiet neighborhood.

programme.title: Death Note: Transfer
programme.desc: Near contacts the Japanese task force and determines that Kira is among their members.

programme.title: Death Note: Selection
programme.desc: Star newscaster Kiyomi Takada becomes Kira's spokesperson to the world.

programme.title: Death Note: Scorn
programme.desc: Light pretends to investigate Kiyomi.

programme.title: Death Note: Vigilance
programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: Death Note: 1.28
programme.desc: Near, along with the SPK, meets Light and the task force at a warehouse for the final showdown.

programme.title: Death Note: New World
programme.desc: Though Mikami has written all the investigators' names in the Death Note, a minute passes and everyone is still alive.

programme.title: Death Note: Rebirth
programme.desc: Brilliant but bored high school student Light Yagami suddenly finds himself holding the power of life and death in his hand, the power of the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Confrontation
programme.desc: While the world's criminals continue to drop dead, L meets by computer with representatives from various nations.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit
programme.desc: Light, now known to the world as Kira, tests the Death Note to understand the scope of its powers by killing off six convicts in various ways.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: Death Note: Unraveling
programme.desc: Light meets a woman at the Police Department with an urgent message for the Kira task force.

programme.title: Death Note: Overcast
programme.desc: Light uses the Death Note to try to get rid of the woman who could get him captured, and is shocked when it doesn't work.

programme.title: Death Note: Glare
programme.desc: L insists on setting up bugs and cameras in the homes of Chief Yagami and Deputy Director Kitamura.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter
programme.desc: The murders continue, and L grows suspicious of Light's too perfect behavior and decides to investigate him on his own.

programme.title: Death Note: Doubt
programme.desc: L's suspicion of Light deepens, compelling him to invite Light into the investigation.

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.title: Death Note: Love
programme.desc: With a second Kira now on the loose, L asks Light to join the task force and pose as the real Kira in order to catch the copycat.

programme.title: Death Note: Confession
programme.desc: Light goes to Aoyama to discover the identity of the second Kira before L becomes more suspicious.

programme.title: Death Note: Friend
programme.desc: Light and Misa show each other their Death Notes, and Light asks Misa to have her shinigami Rem get rid of L.

programme.title: Death Note: Wager
programme.desc: Evidence turns up that points to Misa Amane as the second Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Decision
programme.desc: Misa is in confinement, though her memories of the Death Note have been completely wiped away.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution
programme.desc: After fifty days of confinement the killings continue, and Misa and Light are released.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters .

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company .

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal
programme.desc: Light has removed everyone in his way and is closer to achieving his perfect world.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1985, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: As ‘The Chosen One’, Murphy’s on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who’s been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Luffy battles an opponent who's too hot to handle, Robin gets attacked by a jungle, and Chopper makes a heroic dash for the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Red Hot Decisive Battle! Luffy vs. The Scorching Don!

programme.title: Luffy's red-hot battle with Papa threatens to destroy the entire icy island, and the rest of the Straw Hats need a little help from a former enemy to recover their flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Waiting in the New World! Farewell to the Brave Pirates!

programme.title: The most adorable hero the world has ever known – Chopperman – must battle a hideously evil villain to regain control of his favorite television station!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopperman to the Rescue! Protect the TV Station by the Shore!

programme.title: While sailing through haunted waters, the Straw Hats encounter a ghost ship that's home to a walking, talking skeleton!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE MYSTERIOUS SKELETON FLOATING THROUGH THE FOG! VENTURE INTO THE DEVIL'S SEA!

programme.title: The Straw Hats attempt to unravel the mystery of their new comrade, but the skeleton's sad story is interrupted by a ghastly landing at the haunted island of Thriller Bark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE JOY OF SEEING PEOPLE! THE GENTLEMAN SKELETON'S TRUE IDENTITY!

programme.title: After getting stranded at Thriller Bark, Chopper, Nami, and Usopp are chased by a three headed beast. Back on the boat, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats are terrorized by an unseen enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ONE UNNATURAL PHENOMENON AFTER THE NEXT! DISEMBARKING ON THRILLER BARK!

programme.title: Chopper, Nami, and Usopp get scared out of their minds when they encounter a graveyard full of zombies! Meanwhile, the rest of the crew gets trapped in super creepy sea web!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE MAN CALLED A GENIUS! HOGBACK MAKES HIS APPEARANCE!

programme.title: An invisible man turns Nami's bath time into a harrowing experience, and Usopp battles a hall full of haunted paintings with a handful of burning candles!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NAMI'S IN A MAJOR PINCH! THE ZOMBIE MANSION AND THE INVISIBLE MAN

programme.title: While Usopp, Nami, and Chopper seek to unravel the secrets of the haunted mansion, Luffy and the gang do battle with an army of the undead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ZOMBIE'S SECRET! HOGBACK'S NIGHTMARISH LABORATORY

programme.title: Luffy sets his sights on the shadowing-stealing monster known as Gecko Moria, and the zombie army prepares for a night attack led by their perverted, invisible leader!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HIS NAME IS MORIA! THE GREAT SHADOW-SEIZING PIRATE'S TRAP

programme.title: Usopp, Chopper, and Nami get trapped in a coffin after being slashed by a zombie samurai. Meanwhile, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats make short work of some haunted paintings!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEAST OF THE ZOMBIE SONG! THE NIGHT HUNT'S BELL IS THE SOUND OF DARKNESS

programme.title: After escaping from their coffin prison, Usopp, Chopper, and Nami do battle with a garden full of adorably dead zombie animals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A BUNCH OF ANIMALS? PERONA'S WONDER GARDEN

programme.title: An undead warthog sets her sights on Nami, Zorro and Sanji vanish without a trace, Franky and Robin battle an unbeatable army, and Luffy gets captured!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE VANISHING STRAW HAT CREW! A MYSTERIOUS SWORDSMAN APPEARS!

programme.title: A penguin zombie starts acting an awful lot like Sanji, Nami continues running for her life, and Robin and Franky buy some time by blowing up a bridge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: CHIVALRY REMAINS! THE TRAITOROUS ZOMBIE PROTECTS NAMI

programme.title: Nami gives love advice to a zombie, Luffy finds himself face-to-face with Gecko Moria, and Robin gets caught in spooky spider web. Things look bleak for the Straw Hats until their skeleton friend lends a hand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: APPEARING FROM THE SKY! THAT MAN IS THE HUMMING SWORDSMAN!

programme.title: Brook strikes the final blow in his battle with the spider monkey, Gecko Moria's devious plan is revealed, and Luffy's escape attempt leads to the loss of something he can't live without!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S EMERGENCY SITUATION! THE ULTIMATE SHADOW'S DESTINATION!

programme.title: Brook tells Franky and Robin the secret to slaying zombies, and Gecko Moria reveals the terrifying monster that will be the recipient of Luffy's shadow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE WARRIOR KNOWN AS THE "DEVIL"!! THE MOMENT OF OARS' REVIVAL

programme.title: Luffy's shadow is forced into the body of a monster, Usopp and Chopper get incinerated, and Nami is kidnapped by a zombie who wants to make her his wife!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AWAKENING AFTER 500 YEARS!! OARS OPENS HIS EYES!!

programme.title: Gecko Moria's minions struggle with the burden of feeding a giant zombie brought to life by Luffy's shadow. Meanwhile, Brook flashes back to a battle that almost cost him his beloved afro!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A BELIEF WORTH BEGGING TO LIVE FOR!! BROOK DEFENDS HIS AFRO

programme.title: The freshly-revived trio of Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji discover that their shadows are missing, and Franky relates Brook's story about a promise he made to a very special whale!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A MAN'S PROMISE NEVER DIES!! TO THE FRIEND WAITING UNDER THE DISTANT SKY

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats flash back to the heartbreaking story of Laboon the abandoned whale, and Brook's battle with the zombie samurai reveals the reason behind his intense afro love!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I SWEAR TO GO SEE HIM!! BROOK AND THE CAPE OF PROMISE

programme.title: Luffy sets out to regain his shadow and convince Brook to join the crew. Meanwhile, Sanji races to stop Nami's zombie wedding before it's too late!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOOD, NAMI AND SHADOWS!! LUFFY'S ENRAGED COUNTERATTACK

programme.title: Usopp's naturally negative personality makes him the only Straw Hat who stands a chance against Perona's depressing army of ghosts, and Chopper prepares to do battle against his hero, Dr. Hogback!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: USOPP'S THE STRONGEST? LEAVE ANYTHING NEGATIVE TO HIM

programme.title: When Brook is overmatched by the zombie samurai, Zoro steps in to help the skeleton get his shadow back. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares for a battle with Gecko Moria, and Sanji interrupts an undead wedding!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GENERAL ZOMBIES ARE DOWN IN A FLASH!! OARS FEELS LIKE AN ADVENTURE!!

programme.title: Despite his furious attempts, Luffy struggles to land a blow against Gecko Moria, but Sanji fares much better in his passionate attempt to defeat Nami's beastly abductor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BLAZING KNIGHT SANJI!! KICK DOWN THE FAKE WEDDING

programme.title: Sanji takes a beating when his opponent suddenly turns invisible, Luffy finally manages to land a blow in his battle with Gecko Moria, and Usopp uses fire to ward off a zombie bear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A CLEAR-CLEAR HISTORY? SANJI'S STOLEN DREAM

programme.title: After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVE ME, HERO!! MY ENEMY IS THE IMMORTAL PRINCESS

programme.title: Usopp reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in his battle with Perona. Meanwhile, Luffy can't lay a finger on Gecko Moria, and a zombie is less than gentlemanly in his battle with Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: PERONA IS TERRIFIED!! USOPP AND UNTRUTHFUL SHARE THE SAME "U"

programme.title: While Franky and Brook watch in awe, Zorro and the zombie samurai wage a sword-slinging battle the likes of which the world has never seen before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SLASHES DANCING ON THE ROOFTOP!! SHOWDOWN: ZORO VS. RYUMA

programme.title: Chopper can no longer contain his fury over Dr. Hogback's evil treatment of his zombie slaves. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares to face the zombie who's wearing his shadow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: CHOPPER IS FURIOUS!! HOGBACK'S EVIL MEDICAL PRACTICES

programme.title: Moria's mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy's shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji's eyes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS ROARS! COME OUT, STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy's got his sights set on Moria, but he'd better hurry if he wants to save his crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY IS THE ENEMY! THE ULTIMATE ZOMBIE VS. THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Nami wakes up just in time to find out she's about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by very jealous warthog!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: YOU'RE GOING DOWN, ABSALOM!! NAMI'S LIGHTNING ATTACK OF FRIENDSHIP!!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsène Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: The Crow: Salvation, (2000, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: The fourth film in the dark superhero franchise is an epic new action tale. After an ex-con tries to straighten out his life, he and his girlfriend are brutally murdered by a renegade gang. A mysterious crow brings him back for revenge and redemption.

programme.title: Legion, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When God loses faith in mankind, he sends his Legion of angels to wipe out the human race for the second time. Man's only hope lies in a group of misfits holed up in a desert diner.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Underworld, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the Underworld, Vampires are a secret clan of modern aristocratic sophisticates whose mortal enemies are the Lycans (werewolves), a shrewd gang of street thugs who prowl the city's underbelly.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution, (2006, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: Vampire death dealer, Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

programme.title: Underworld Awakening, (2011, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrioress Selene leads the battle against humankind.

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita, (1944, Western)
programme.desc: A worthless gold mine might in fact have hidden gold deposits. Leave it to Roy to find out the truth!

programme.title: San Fernando Valley, (1944, Western)
programme.desc: A ranch owner fires his ranch hands and brings in women to replace them. The owner's daughter wants the male hands back and comes up with a plan to do it. They will rustle the horses and bring the men in to get their old jobs back.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Rosalee, star-struck small-town girl, wins a date with the Hollywood hunk Tad Hamilton. And while it may be Rosalee's dream-come-true, it means complete chaos for her best friend Pete.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Elle Woods has it all, but when her boyfriend goes to Harvard, Ellie rallies all her resources to get into Harvard Law. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of home. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for herself and for all blondes!

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Now a rising lawyer, Elle Woods is about to make partner at her firm, she and Emmett are still love, and her hair is still healthy. Elle heads to D.C. and take matters into her own hands.

programme.title: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Rosalee, star-struck small-town girl, wins a date with the Hollywood hunk Tad Hamilton. And while it may be Rosalee's dream-come-true, it means complete chaos for her best friend Pete.

programme.title: Serendipity, (2001, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: In the course of one magical evening, Jonathan (John Cusack) and Sara (Kate Bekinsale) meet unexpectedly, but part ways, determining that fate will guide their future if they're meant to be together.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Bless the Child, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Omens and concepts of good vs. evil have no place in Maggie O'Connor's well-ordered, practical universe. That is until she becomes the caregiver for mankind's last hope - a child who's just turned six.

programme.title: Knowing, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A professor (Nicolas Cage) deciphers a mysterious code foretelling future calamities. Can he somehow avert them?

programme.title: A fight causes tensions in Oceanside while the Alexandrians set out on a high-stakes mission.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group must figure out how to get out of a precarious situation.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group must defend Alexandria from a threatening outside force.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
